comments: Midterms and finals are not as easy as the samples. I did great in other math courses before this class but earned only B\'s for the in class midterms. However, don\'t be discouraged! I tried my best in the common final and after all I\'ve got A+. Although Li said he wouldn\'t curve, he did give a big curve. Li is nice if you approach him for help.

Though his accent took some getting use to, the lectures were very helpful in understanding and the examples he provided really made you think. Granted, I would sometimes have difficulty understanding, but he was more than helpful in office hours and by email. I really enjoyed math with this professor and highly recommend him.
hard to understand. exams and quizzes were pretty easy if you did suggested problems from book. final killed me though. dropped be a whole letter grade -_____- TA was really helpful.
This teacher knows what he is talking about and is easy until the tests come along. And it isn\'t clear what he is saying, thick accent, and doesn\'t slow down even if you ask him to.

He\'s not that bad, Midterm / final were closely related to the study guides which he gave out before hand. Think the only reason people didn\'t like the class was that there was no book to follow. Personally I enjoyed the class =)

very very very bad teacher. he\'s smart but he cant explain what he means. lecture notes is like a whole book itself, txtbook useless. cant answer questions.unreasonable amount of hw. refuse to go slower to stick w/ his agenda though half of d class got lost already. class is not supposed to b hard but he made it hard. Take Baochi if she teach it.
